## Functions

### createFunctionType() {#a7ae16889db439f8fbb234fe3de672d11}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>FunctionType &#42; llvm::VFABI::createFunctionType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo">VFInfo</a> &amp; Info, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42; ScalarFTy)</>}>
Constructs a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> by applying vector function information to the type of a matching scalar function.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Info">gets the vectorization factor (VF) and the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add480f2ed87faa59c16d4c01ffb4bf39">VFParamKind</a> of the parameters.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="ScalarFTy">gets the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> information of parameters, as it is not stored in <code>Info</code>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
a pointer to a newly created vector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a>
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h/#l00207">207</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp/#l00556">556</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp">VFABIDemangler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getVectorVariantNames() {#a8adf44ad04562ff150b0e8e352a38d46}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::VFABI::getVectorVariantNames (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &amp; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; std::string &gt; &amp; VariantMappings)</>}>
Populates a set of strings representing the Vector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> ABI variants associated to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> CI.

If the CI does not contain the vector-function-abi-variant attribute, we return without populating VariantMappings, i.e. callers of getVectorVariantNames need not check for the presence of the attribute (see <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/injecttlimappings">InjectTLIMappings</a>).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h/#l00197">197</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp/#l00535">535</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp">VFABIDemangler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### tryDemangleForVFABI() {#a46c9ccb087f925d00317f16577410a13}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; VFInfo &gt; llvm::VFABI::tryDemangleForVFABI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> MangledName, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42; FTy)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> to construct a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo">VFInfo</a> out of a mangled names in the following format:

&lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt;&#123;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#125;

where &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is the name of the vector function, mangled according to the rules described in the Vector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> ABI of the target vector extension (or &lt;isa&gt; from now on). The &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is in the following format:

<em>ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;</em>&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;

This methods support demangling rules for the following &lt;isa&gt;:


<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a>: <a href="https://developer.arm.com/docs/101129/latest">https://developer.arm.com/docs/101129/latest</a></li>
<li>x86 (libmvec): <a href="https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec">https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec</a> and <a href="https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec?action=AttachFile&do=view&target=VectorABI.txt">https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec?action=AttachFile&amp;do=view&amp;target=VectorABI.txt</a></li>
</ul>



<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="MangledName">-&gt; input string in the format <em>ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;</em>&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FTy">-&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> of the scalar function which we&#39;re trying to find a vectorized variant for. This is required to determine the vectorization factor for scalable vectors, since the mangled name doesn&#39;t encode that; it needs to be derived from the widest element types of vector arguments or return values.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h/#l00183">183</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp/#l00379">379</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/vfabidemangler-cpp">VFABIDemangler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### &#95;LLVM&#95; {#af33ac7943ba16e891cd1b6e307029301}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>char const&#42; llvm::VFABI::&#95;LLVM&#95; = &quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;&quot;</>}
  labels = {["constexpr", "static"]}>
LLVM Internal <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi">VFABI</a> ISA token for vector functions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h/#l00148">148</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### &#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95; {#a3b4aafd885099e61903f0a29e638a8b1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>char const&#42; llvm::VFABI::&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95; = &quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;&quot;</>}
  labels = {["constexpr", "static"]}>
Prefix for internal name redirection for vector function that tells the compiler to scalarize the call using the scalar name of the function.

For example, a mangled name like <code>&#95;ZGV&#95;LLVM&#95;N2v&#95;foo(&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;foo)</code> would tell the vectorizer to vectorize the scalar call <code>foo</code>, and to scalarize it once vectorization is done.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h/#l00155">155</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["constexpr", "static"]}>
